comment.author: 60411418@N08
comment._content:
- Thinking about what might have been being taught to them at the time of the photo--and comparing it to what knowledge we have about the subject now--I wonder what we've learned since.

- All of these children would be older than the man in the picture. These kids could have ended up doing almost anything with their lives.

- There actually appears to be a man in some kind of suit-coat, and he's sitting in the woods with a handkerchief in his pocket. That never happens anymore, I'm pretty sure.

Awesome.
